text: Old City often refers to old town, the historic or original core of a city or town. Old City may refer to several places: ==Historical cities or regions of cities == (by country) *Old City (Baku), Azerbaijan *Old Quebec, Canada, also called Old City *Old City (Shanghai), China *Old City, Bristol, England *Old City of Freiburg, Germany *Old City (Hyderabad, India) *Old City (Jaffa), Israel *Old City (Jerusalem) *Old Town, Oslo, Norway *Old City (Hyderabad, Sindh), Pakistan *Old City, Lahore, Pakistan *Old City, Gaza, Palestine *Old City (Zamość), Poland *Old City (Bern), Switzerland *Old City of Zuoying, Taiwan *Eskişehir (Old City), Turkey *Near Northeast, Washington, D.C., United States, historically called Old City *Old City, Knoxville, Tennessee, United States *Old City, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States *Old City District, a district of the Amanat Al Asimah Governorate, Yemen ==Other== *Old City Cemetery (disambiguation) *Old City Gaol, Bristol, England *Old City Hall (disambiguation) *Old City Waterworks, Tallahassee, Florida, United States ==See also== *Old Town (disambiguation) *Oldtown (disambiguation) *New City (disambiguation) *
title: Old City
